Wowhead

Howling in the Hills

Bring Yowler's Paw to Verner Osgood in Lakeshire.
Yowler's Paw

Description

<name>, the gnolls are still out there. I can hear their baying as they hunt in the hills above Lakeshire. And one cry is louder than the rest - Yowler, their leader.

Kill Yowler and send his pack scattering! Bring me his paw as proof.

And be careful, this gnoll is their leader for a reason. He is no Mongrel...

Reward

You can choose one of these awards:
Ring of Iron Will
Gold Militia Boots

Progress

Yowler is a dangerous creature, <name>. If you're not ready for him, I understand.

Completion

Again, thank you for your help. The Stormwind army is so busy dealing with the orcs, they don't have the troops to protect Redridge from local threats like the gnolls.

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 2000 Experience
  • 100 Reputation with Stormwind
